content: What surprises me more is when I see desktop version of sites that uses the hamburger icon, I mean, seriously? With 1800 pixel wide you still “need” to hide your main menu? In our mobile website we have an hamburger icon that show dozens of product categories, but the main sections are visible all the time with what you call “Scrollable navigation”, so the hamburger icon remains only as an alternative to the main navigation. I find this a fine solution for all.
